kink.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a twist in something that is normally straight
kink.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: The water hose had a kink in it.
kink.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a small problem in a plan, system etc
kink.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: Given the size of the task, a few kinks are inevitable.

kink.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to have, get, or make a kink
kink.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: Take care to avoid kinking the wire.
